summary.p: [Gwalther] should as soon as possible compose a [Latin] distich [from the German verse shared by Bullinger].

div.p: Greetings. I ask my friend, that you compose this distich for me as soon as you have time.
You will do a most pleasing thing.
Do not follow God, makes poor people, God's word does not need our lifting.
Uzzah touches the ark and falls. 2 Samuel 6 [6-8]. Nadab and Abihu offer strange fire and are burned. Leviticus 10 [1-5].
Why, oh miserable ones, does it please you to despise the word of the Lord?
It does not seek help from your strength.
